inclusion.criterion: Patients who have given voluntary written informed consent to participate in this study prior to conducting Screening (Visit 1) procedures;
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients 18 years of age or older with a diagnosis of type 2 diabetes;
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Women of childbearing potential (WOCBP) who agree to use appropriate birth control (double-barrier methods, hormonal contraceptives, or intrauterine device) for the duration of the study;
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: All women of childbearing potential must have a negative serum pregnancy test at Visit 1;
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients with a history of overt diabetic nephropathy, as defined by the following: A SCr measurement ≥1.3 (≥1.25)mg/dL (111 µmol/L) for females or ≥1.5 (≥1.45) mg/dL (128 µmol/L) for males;
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have a SCr measurement <3.0 mg/dL (265 µmol/L);
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient must have an eGFR of ≥20 mL/min/1.73m2, using the 4-variable Modification of Diet in Renal Disease equation;
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients must be taking a single ACE-I or ARB at a constant dose for at least 26 weeks prior to Visit 1;
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients taking any blood pressure medications in addition to an ACE-I or ARB, including diuretics, must be on a stable dose for 13 weeks prior to Visit 1;
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients with type 1 diabetes or MODY (a monogenic form of diabetes);
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Patients receiving a renin inhibitor or an aldosterone antagonist or a combination of an ACE-I and an ARB within 26 weeks of Visit 1;
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient has type 2 diabetes, but is also taking a combination of an ACE-I and an ARB, which makes them ineligible for the study.
